objects.specification: A broad, flat floor plane stretching across the entire classroom space, finished in a smooth, matte pale tone that reflects soft ambient lighting. The surface is seamless and even, providing a sturdy foundation with minimal texture to allow easy cleaning and maintenance. Subtle edging defines the boundary where the floor meets the walls, ensuring a neat, professional appearance.

A tall, smooth interior wall painted in a clean white tone to maximize brightness, stretching the full width of the classroom. The surface is flat and uniform, designed to support mounted items such as a whiteboard and clock. The crisp finish helps reflect light and maintain a bright, inviting atmosphere.

A plain rear classroom wall coated in a pale, neutral paint that promotes an open feel, with a perfectly flat and uninterrupted surface. This wall is designed to display educational posters evenly spaced and supports mounting hardware without visible seams. The finish is uniform, providing a clean backdrop for visual materials.

A continuous left-side interior wall finished in a soft white hue to maintain consistency, with a smooth, matte surface ideal for mounting shelving or other fixtures. The wall is unbroken except for the integration point for the bookshelf, providing a neutral backdrop that blends seamlessly with the room design.

A right-side wall painted in a bright, pale shade to enhance daylight and interior lighting, featuring a uniform, smooth surface ideal for window installation. The wall finish is clean and untextured, designed to seamlessly integrate a large window with curtains while maintaining structural integrity.

A large, rectangular teacher’s desk crafted from dark wood grain material, featuring a smooth, polished surface and subtle bevelled edges for an elegant yet durable appearance. The desk rests on sturdy, metal-reinforced legs finished in a complementary muted tone, providing stability and a professional aesthetic. Beneath the tabletop, discreet drawers and shelves offer ample storage without disrupting the clean lines of the design.

An ergonomic teacher’s chair upholstered in a muted complementary tone, featuring a padded seat and backrest with gentle contours for comfort during extended use. The chair sits on a sturdy metal frame with subtly flared legs that match the desk’s supports. A modest backrest height ensures support without obstructing sightlines.

A large, rectangular whiteboard with a glossy, low-reflective writing surface framed by a slim aluminum bezel that provides a sleek and modern aesthetic. The writing area is crisp and uniformly white, designed to accept markers cleanly and erase without residue. Mounting hardware is concealed behind the board for a floating appearance.

A circular analog wall clock featuring a slim black metal frame, a white face with bold black numerals, and slender black hands for excellent legibility from all areas of the room. The clock’s minimalist design complements the classroom style while providing reliable timekeeping. The face is protected by a clear, scratch-resistant cover.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white housing and integrated ventilation grilles, designed to align precisely with the whiteboard below. The unit features a high-quality lens assembly centered on the front face and minimal visual bulk. Cables and mounting hardware are neatly concealed to maintain a clean ceiling plane.

A standard rectangular student desk finished in a light wood tone with a subtle grain texture, supported by slender metal legs painted in a neutral muted color. The desktop surface is smooth with gently rounded corners for safety, and the under-surface features a shallow shelf for storing books and supplies. The design balances durability and simplicity to suit a learning environment.

The desktop surface is smooth with gently rounded corners for safety, and the under-surface features a shallow shelf for storing books and supplies. A simple student chair featuring a softly padded seat and backrest upholstered in a complementary muted color, supported by four slim metal legs finished in a neutral tone. The backrest has a slight curve to provide lumbar support, and the seat is gently contoured for comfort. The overall silhouette is minimalistic, blending seamlessly with the desk design.

A tall, freestanding bookshelf constructed from dark wood tone material with a subtle matte finish, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with a variety of multicolored books. The shelves have a slight lip to prevent items from slipping off, and the overall frame is reinforced with discreet metal brackets for stability. The design combines functionality with a warm aesthetic to complement the room’s decor.

A large rectangular window with clear glass panes, framed in a crisp white casing that contrasts softly against the pale wall. Lightweight, floor-length curtains in a gentle complementary hue hang from a concealed top rail, with a slight gather to add texture. The design allows ample natural light while providing privacy when drawn.

An educational wall poster featuring vibrant, high-contrast graphics and clear, legible text that illustrate key learning concepts. The print is mounted on a lightweight, stiff backing with a thin border and coated with a matte finish to reduce glare. The size and visual style are designed to engage students’ attention without overwhelming the wall space.

A cylindrical waste bin made of durable grey plastic with a slightly tapered profile, featuring a smooth, matte finish that resists scuffs and fingerprints. The rim has a gentle inward curve to hold standard liners in place. Its unobtrusive design complements the classroom while providing practical waste containment.

A cylindrical waste bin made of durable grey plastic with a slightly tapered profile, featuring a smooth, matte finish that resists scuffs and fingerprints. The rim has a gentle inward curve to hold standard liners in place. Its unobtrusive design complements the classroom while providing practical waste containment.

A decorative indoor plant in a glazed ceramic pot with a muted neutral tone, featuring lush green foliage and slender branches that fan out naturally. The pot has a gently rounded lip and a subtle texture for visual interest. This accent piece adds a touch of organic warmth and color contrast to the classroom environment.

A low-profile, circular ceiling light with a frosted glass diffuser set within a slim metal bezel. The design provides soft, evenly distributed illumination without glare and blends unobtrusively into the ceiling plane. The fixture is compact yet bright enough to support classroom activities.
